summary: "Bone Tomahawk" is a 2015 Western movie directed by S. Craig Zahler. It stars Kurt Russell and Patrick Wilson. The story follows a town sheriff who leads a group to save people kidnapped by cannibalistic Native Americans. Originally inspired by Zahler's novel, the movie was changed to fit a lower budget. Filming happened quickly in California. The movie got good reviews and made over $5 million.
title: Bone Tomahawk
